list.description:
Default sight bonus art package 2

Howdy fellas!

The second batch of the default sight bonus art package is now here, and contains all my bonus art from the Kino logo up until the Kilroy was here decal. It's a modification of the vanilla short range sight without the horizontal ranging lines.

Likewise with my previous default sight pack, just drop the 6 blk files that you simply drop in the game folder --> usersights --> all_tanks
the WTdraw files are also included. When done modifying it, simply export as a .txt file, copy inside of the txt file and paste ...

Vanilla Historical Sight Presets V1.3

/Changelog
Fine-tuning of many presets. Addition of presets AA2 and ZTZ99.

/Explanation
Replicate the historical GPS or FCS look of tanks using the sights provided in War Thunder.

Sight thickness, font size, color, transparency, layout, crosshairs, which cannot be adjusted within the game, have been adjusted.

There are 24 sight presets, mainly for MBT and IFV.
Includes all presets from previous version.

This preset was created to replicate historical sights but with an emphasis on practicality in Ground RB.

Leopard 2 Custom Sight

Fixed my old custom sight as it was broken ever since that one update where it broke everyone's custom sight.

How to install:
1 - Navigate to "#:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights"
2 - In the "UserSights" folder there should be an "all_tanks" folder if not you can create the folder yourself
3 - Drag the "Custom_Leo_2_Sight.blk" file into the "all_tanks" folder
4 - Load up the game (or reload the sights if it's already running) and go to your "sight settings" in the "Ground vehicle Battle Settings"
5 - Select...

CVLIFE Eaglefeather sniper reticle

Hi fellas!
This is my 9th usersight based on the CVLIFE Eaglefeather 1-6X24 LPVO rifle scope. The design was pretty interesting and it caught my eye as I was searching for more usersights to make.

I've made the shapes around the reticle to be outlined instead of filled to translate it into a WT sight that's usable for low tier and high tier engagements by including 2 variants of the sight with or without ballistic range lines.

I also arranged the ballistic indicators to integrate well enough that the numbers will align...

B-17 sight by Zetta

if it doesn't work, then:

1: find war thunder in your steam library
2: right-click the war thunder game tab and go to "manage --> browse local files"
3: navigate to your "UserSights" folder
4: create a new folder (unless you already have one) and rename it to include the country of origin and the name of the tank (ex. ussr_t_72m2_moderna | germ_marder_1a1), then open that folder, and drop the sight in.
*5: if your war thunder client is already running, press Alt+F9 to reload the sight cache. if it doe...
